price: 创造你们和复活你们，只像创造一个人和复活一个人一样。安拉确是全聪的，确是全明的。
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
